education.name: Helderkruin Primary
education.description: I spent my primary school years at Helderkruin Primary. This is where I learnt basic knowledge and made my first few friends. It was also during this period that I discovered my love for computers and games.

education.name: Malibu High School
education.description: Malibu High school is where I spent my final years at school. I learnt so much during this period and this I become the person I am today during this part of my life. This is where my interest in coding sparked.

education.name: Life Choices Academy
education.description: Life Choices Academy is where I started my journey as a developer. The main focus during this course is web development and this course is a huge kickstart to my career.

projects.name: To-Do List
projects.description: We were tasked during the Javascript module to build a To-do list. It was quite a fun experience and it elevated my skills in applying Javascript to the next level.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This is my Javascript Calculator. Probably one of my most favourite projects that I have build. I learnt so much while building this application and I also use it whenever I need to calculate something.

projects.name: Random Meme Generator
projects.description: This was a project that I built using an API that generates random memes. Before we started learning how to use and manipulate APIs, I took initiative one day whilst being bored to build my own project and this amazing, entertaining app is what I ended up building.

projects.name: Stop Watch
projects.description: This is a project I built once when I was incredibly bored at home. I wanted to learn more about Javascript timing functions and searched for a project to build. This is also one of my most favourite projects that I ever built.

projects.name: Pokédex App
projects.description: Another project I built to improve my skill using Javascript. This Pokédex gives you basic data about the popular anime series, Pokémon's first group of Pokémon.

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.description: This was a small game that I decided to build during my free time. I had fun building this and this improved my skill and implementation skills using Javascript.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: This was a temperature converter that I built one day during class out of boredom. This application converts from Celsius to Farenheit and vice versa.

projects.name: Javascript End Of Module Project
projects.description: This was my second End Of Module Project that I built. It is an e-commerce website that uses local storage to change, update, create and delete products.

testimonials.name: Laiquah Cotie
testimonials.testimonial: Eighton-Lee is a team player and a vibrant person. His a hard-worker and always tries his best at getting a job done higher than the standards set. I would recommend him if you need someone who is committed and motivated to get a job done.

testimonials.name: Ganiefah Majiet
testimonials.testimonial: It's always a pleasure to work with Eighton-Lee. He has an infectious personality and he always brings out the best in others. He motivates everyone around him and he's always ready to offer a helping hand to anybody when needed. He has a go getter mindset that he applies himself to and does his best to achieve what he wants. I would definitely recommend him.

testimonials.name: Nuraan Samodien
testimonials.testimonial: Eighton-Lee is a highly thought intellectual from my perspective. He is passionate, ambitious, hardworking and always provides a helping hand to anyone who needs it. He has great communication and leadership skills and any company would be lucky to have him on their team.

testimonials.name: Mish-Al Taliep
testimonials.testimonial: Eighton-Lee is an excellent student. He is always improving and looking for ways to up-skill himself. He shows good work ethics and is academically strong.

testimonials.name: Uzukhanye Dywili
testimonials.testimonial: Working with Eighton-Lee was an incredible experience. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and communication skills made the entire process seamless. They consistently exceeded my expectations and delivered exceptional results. I would highly recommend Eighton-Lee to anyone looking for a talented and dedicated professional.

testimonials.name: Joel Mukhanya
testimonials.testimonial: Eighton-lee is very well-behaved, social, and dedicated. He enjoys working with his peers and works well on his projects. He learned HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript and VueJS.
